    • SimpleItemFilter

    SimpleItemFilter

    new SimpleItemFilter(group, options)

    Constructor for the SimpleItemFilter

    Source:
    • simple-item-filter.js, line 46
    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    group string

    The name of the group of items being filtered
    options object

    Configuration options, all are optional defaults are shown below

    Name Type Description
    prefix string

    The CSS class prefix. Default: sf
    activeClass string

    CSS class applied to active button(s). Default: ${prefix}-active
    hiddenClass string

    CSS class applied to hidden item(s). Default: ${prefix}-hidden
    multiselect boolean

    If true enables multiselect for primary and secondary filters. Default: false
    fade boolean

    adds fade class to buttons not selected, unless no buttons are selected. Default: false
    fadeClass string

    class that is added to non-selected buttons when not selected. Default: ${prefix}-fade
    toggle boolean

    toggles buttons when they are clicked Default: true
    btnFn function

    function that is called on click events to determine if the event.target is correct. Used when the event handler is attached to a element up the tree from the element being clicked. Returns true if the event is to be processed or false if not.
